title: Faiz Essa
text:
I am a research assistant (or a “pre-doc”) at the NBER, working with Samuel Bazzi.
I received my MA in Economics and BA in Economics and Mathematics from Boston University. I hope to start my Ph.D. in Economics in the Fall of 2025.
My research interests are in political economy and development.
You can view my CV here and email me at essaf@nber.org.

Research in progress
Internet Shutdowns.
Religion in the Digital Age, with Layane Alhorr, Samuel Bazzi, and Benjamin Marx.
Shaping Collective Action Through the Policies of Social Media Platforms: The Case of WhatsApp’s Forwarding Limits, with Siddharth George, Karsten Müller, and Carlo Schwarz.
